title: ¨Unspecified Error Occured¨ 6.22 Patch Error
body: hey ive been having this problem for almost 3 days now for this patch. whenever my files on 33% finish scanning and its on step 2 for about 37% i always get an ¨Update Failed¨ message. i tried removing my lol_air_client foler, hextech thing and that connections guide you guys have been sending to people ive tried all of these for about the 11th time now and im still doing em again to see if i have any luck but sadly nah. i really hope i can get a help on these because i really wanna try the new reworks and see if they have anything good on them. thanks in advance!

replies.body:
Since you've already worked through the entire connection guide and are still experiencing this issue, we'll need to dive into some specific system logs to pinpoint what's causing this. I'd recommend running a set using our [Hextech Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our techs can work with you on this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
